title: Boards look so dam pretty
body:
It's gotta be said, this new forum (DONT CALL IT THAT) is **beautiful.**

Classy job Riot.
Classy job.

replies.body: ah yes, I love my two shades of blue. there's lighter blue, and darker blue. truly the most beautiful.

We should be able to customise our own web page on the Boards, kinda like Gmail lets you choose your own themes :D

{{champion:268}} SHU- LEMUR!!

Beautiful, but functions worse than a fish on a turntable.

If you use the chronological view (traditional), then you don't get to see when someone replied to someone else (FOR NO REASON) so you get all of these out of context messages. If you use discussion view, then you get them all out of order and you don't know who originally started it.

It's a terrible, beautiful, confusing mess.
